original_text: And they went in unto Noah into the ark, two and two of all flesh, wherein is the breath of life.
korean_text: 무릇 생명의 기운이 있는 육체가 둘씩 노아에게 나아와 방주로 들어갔으니

sentences.original_text: And they went in unto Noah into the ark
two and two of all flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 살아있는 것들이 두 마리씩 짝을 지어

sentences.original_text: wherein is the breath of life
